content.raw:
There is an approximation of tracked vehicle support in Ignition using a large number of wheels. See https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/examples/worlds/track_drive.sdf.

Ignition is not Gazebo9/10/11. The Ignition code resides in separate repositories (https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/) and has a different API. There is also a separate [web page](https://ignitionrobotics.org/), with [release information](https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/all/releases). Additionally, there are separate debians for Ignition. 

Here is a [migration guide](https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/gazebo/3.0/migrationplugins.html).
